text:
Top work <@U0357PHGNBT>! Realised my issue was that the secret was case sensitive in the end.... The little things ehy?

For the body, any thoughts on styling? Creating paragraphs, or bolding out text for example

Thanks, appreciate that, for styling, you could just use inline style on the body as such
 ” let body =‘<h1 style=“color: green”>This is the the body of the NOTE</h1>’ ”
hope this helps
Ah, didn't think it was as simple as in-line. Was going to try at some point this morning. Thanks for confirming!

Accounting extension - connected APP: How to define field mappings for Contacts and products


Hello all, I want to use the accounting extension.
Therefore I have created an App, defined the settings (crm/v3/extensions/accounting/settings),
combined the user account (crm/v3/extensions/accounting/user-accounts).

In the settings of the installed app I defined the contact sync rules and the product sync rules.
But in the Cards 'Contact field mapping' and 'Product field mapping' the button 'Add new mapping' ist disabled.

Where can I define this mappings? (what is necessary to enable this button?)
Is there an API-endpoint to define new mappings?

Hello everyone,
This is a questions about _*Offline Events and Facebook Lead Generation Campaigns:*_
• I have connected my client HS and FB accounts
• now I also created events in HS and I want to push them to FB - I though that would be easy
• but it seems like it is not possible to launch campaigns that optimize by events unless I also use a developer to connect HS *CRM* to FB.
• the above is what I understand after spending 4 hours yesterday trying to figure out why I do not see the offline events in FB. and after chatting with Facebook support and got from them this answer:
• Do I need a developer to do the integration? The answer to this question is yes, you may check this link to learn more about "CRM Integration".
<https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/conversions-api/guides/crm-integration>
Set Up Your CRM for Conversion Leads
<https://www.facebook.com/business/help/279369167153556>
• I just chated with HS Support and the answer was - it seems like offline conversion events are indeed not the easiest for Facebook to ingest and they do require some form of custom integration
Does anyone have experiance with such integration and can help me get things working?

Hello! I'm new in this group. I'm trying to create reports with HubSpot information in Python, using the API. I want to know how to access for example deal logs, such as the date it changed funnel stage and things like that.
So far I was just able to retrieve basic information such as owner ID, amount, etc.

Can anyone confirm the following from the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search|HubSpot Documentation>? Is it EACH search endpoint is limited to 4 requests/sec OR ALL search endpoints are limited to 4 requests/sec?
How can I get a deal on the basis of associated contact using the search filter api on deal?

i’m not sure if that distinction matters unless you’re making multiple requests in parallel, right? If you are indeed making requests in parallel, an easy way to test it out would be to make 5 requests on one and then try to make 1 request using another all under a second.
Correct, I am going to attempt to make requests in parallel. I'll go ahead with a test if no one immediately knows one way or the other

G'day <@U03KKG7KY4S>, you will use the */crm/v3/objects/deals endpoint with ?*propertiesWithHistory=dealstage, it'll return every change in the deal stage with a timestamp in dd-mm-yyyy T HH:MM:SSZ format and the value of the change
Is it possible to update system fields like "Became Marketing Qualified Lead Date" using the API?

Hey i need one solution regarding pagination with HubSpot API getPage API

how i will use pagination with HubSpot APIs
